summary: Audits often rely on data as evidence. This requires auditors to assess the reliability of the data they are using—i.e., its accuracy, completeness, and applicability for the purposes of the audit. We published this guide to help auditors assess the reliability of data. It provides a risk-based framework for data reliability assessments that can be geared to the specific circumstances of each engagement. The framework...
title: Assessing Data Reliability (Supersedes GAO-09-680G)
